com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment

Class DynamicViewPagerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicViewPagerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener

    public abstract class DynamicViewPagerFragment
extends DynamicFragment
    An abstract ViewPager fragment to display multiple fragments inside the view pager along with the tabs. Just extend this fragment and implement the necessary functions to use it inside an activity.
    See Also:
    getTitles(), getPages()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ADS_ARGS_VIEW_PAGER_PAGE
      Fragment argument key to set the initial view pager page.
